import React, { Component } from 'react'; import InputField from './input-field'; import LoanLogo from '../assets/svg/money-loan-logo.svg'; import Data from '../assets/data/data.json'; class LoanForm extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { firstName: '', surname: '', dateOfBirth: '', email: '', postcode: '', companyName: '', annualTurnover: '', loanAmout: '', loanTerm: '', formErrors: { firstNameError: '', surnameError: '', dateOfBirthError: '', emailError: '', postcodeError: '', companyNameError: '', annualTurnoverError: '', loanAmoutError: '', loanTermError: '', } }; } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); } handleInputChange = (event) => { const { value, name } = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: value}); } render() { const {firstName, surname, dateOfBirth, email, postcode, companyName, annualTurnover, loanAmout, loanTerm} = this.state; return (
